function.name: washingRinseCycle_decrease
function.description: This function is used to decrease the number of rinse cycles on a washing machine.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to decrease the rinse cycles.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to decrease the rinse cycles for.

rinseCycleDelta.description: The amount by which to decrease the rinse cycles.
